sources.title: 1933 Ein Lied Für Dich ( Jenny Jugo, Ida Wüst, Paul Kemp, Paul Hörbiger, Ralph Arthur Roberts, Jan Kiepura, Hans Junkermann)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1933. Ein Lied für Dich.  U.a mit Ida Wüst,Paul Hörbiger und Ralph Arthur Roberts

metadata.Plot: During a concert tour, famous tenor Riccardo Gatti meets Lixie at an Aida rehearsal and takes her for a ballet dancer. She is in fact trying to get a position for her boyfriend, so she accepts Gatti's date for supper. When she runs away he publishes a newspaper ad offering to give a concert anywhere she chooses if she shows up. She chooses a swimming pool hoping to discourage him. But he accepts..
metadata.Writer: Rudolph Bernauer, Ernst Marischka, Irma von Cube
metadata.Actors: Jan Kiepura, Jenny Jugo, Paul Kemp
